publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3216 Frances Curran: Condolences to the People of Baghdadâ€”That the Parliament expresses its condolences to the people of Baghdad, where over 600 people were killed when panic swept through a crowd of pilgrims over claims that suicide bombers were present; notes that this tragic event underlines the fear and lack of security in Iraq, and offers sympathy to the ordinary people who live with this insecurity every day.
S2M-3216 Condolences to the People of Baghdad (lodged on 31 August 2005) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-3216 Condolences to the People of Baghdad (lodged on 31 August 2005) Mr Mark Ruskell*
